title: DDFP 338: Trading Drew Brees
itunes:title: DDFP 338: Trading Drew Brees
description:
Shek, Handsome Hank and Elliot Harrison wonder if it's time for the Saints to trade Drew Brees and speculate which teams could best use the star quarterback's services. The guys also react to Chris Borland's surprising retirement and discuss interesting jobs from their pasts. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
